  1. net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns

Uses of Package
net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns

Packages that use net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns
Package
Description
net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns
This package defines annotations for design patterns to help understand the design and function of classes
net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils
Contains simple classes that are not present in the standard java library
net.tvburger.jdl.model
Defines the concepts for estimation functions
net.tvburger.jdl.model.distances
Package for distance metrics
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn
Defines the neural network as specialization of an estimation function
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.activations
Implements the different activation functions for neurons
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.initializers
Defines the neural network initialization algorithms
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.optimizers
Contains the neural network optimizer algorithms
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training
Defines the concepts related for training an estimation function
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss
Provides the different loss functions used for training
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes
Provides the different regimes for training
  • Classes in net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns used by net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns
    Class
    Description
    DesignPattern
    Marker for design pattern annotations.
    DesignPattern.Category
    Represents high-level categories of software design patterns.
    Strategy.Role
    Represents the role of a class or interface within the Strategy design pattern.
  • Classes in net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns used by net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils
    Class
    Description
    Composition
    Marks a class or type as using the Composition design pattern.
    Holder
    Marks a class or type as a Holder structure.
    StaticFactory
    Marks a class, method, or constructor as implementing the Static Factory pattern.
    StaticUtility
    Marks a class as a Static Utility class: - Only static methods - No state (no instance fields) - Not meant to be instantiated
  • Classes in net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns used by net.tvburger.jdl.model

    Description

    Marks a class or type as using the Composition design pattern.

    Marks a class as a Domain Object.

    Marks a class or method as participating in the Factory Method design pattern.

    Marks a class, method, or constructor as implementing the Static Factory pattern.
    Strategy
    Marks a class or interface as part of the Strategy Pattern.
    ValueObject
    Marks a class as a Value Object in the domain model.
